second action we can take to be carbon efficient is to be Hardware efficient and that means use the least amount of
embodied carbon possible embodied carbon is the term we use for
the carbon debt that comes with any physical object so for servers for example we have to mine all the
materials somewhere we ship them around the world likely several times and assemble them in this very energy
intensive process and then eventually the server landed on your server room or the phone landed in your hand or

and then you add on to that M the embodied carbon of the hardware use that
